title: A question about Lunar Revel
body:
I just came back after an extended hiatus, too see that the Lunar Revel event was just about to end, and I saw the Firecracker Vayne PE skin and I really want it.
It says that tokens dissapear on the 18th of March, and I have about 40 on me, and 150 in my stash. I can earn the tokens to get her within the month, but that's where my question is.
Do Lunar Revel event items like the skins, orbs and pass go the same time as the orbs expiry? I can earn the tokens between now and then for it, I just don't want to have spend an assload of money getting it.

Thank you all!

replies.body:
i don't think so/ items you obtain shouldnt expire after the event where they are obtained, with exeption of tokens/and such which have their expiry marked out clearly in their description
https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-lunar-revel-2019 
doesnt specify however the items you obtain from trading in tokens are said to be "available til" and does not have "expiry date" unlike the token.
also found nothing on league wikia
answer? more likely no. good luck with fc vayne pe
It took me from event start to three days ago to get 1000 tokens. You could buy the bundles which have tokens in them, IIRC.
